thought: The website is live and accessible. Now I need to extract the text and check the domain information.
observation: Baxley's Chocolates – Baxley's Chocolates  Search close (esc) Close menu Home About Shop Shipping Special Occasions Shop Parties Weddings & Events Corporate Gifts Events & Classes Contact 828-631-3379 baxleyschocolates@gmail.com 546 West Main Street, Sylva, NC, 28779 Monday-Friday 12pm-6 pm, Saturdays 10am - 6pm Facebook Instagram Close cart Send a gift of chocolate to someone special. Use our online shipping today! Menu Cart Shop Now Use left/right arrows to navigate the slideshow or swipe left/right if using a mobile device Back to site navigation About Baxley's Chocolates Over the years we have put our own twist to a few traditional chocolate recipes. We think you will enjoy the unique flavors and textures of each item. As always, they are hand-crafted in small batches in our own kitchen to offer you the freshest chocolates possible. All are available enrobed in milk or dark chocolate. products Baxley’s Signature Assortment from Caramels ~ Salted Sugar Plums Peanut Butter Meltaways Catamount Paws Peanut Brittle Regular price Butter Crèmes Assortment Bourbon Truffles Catamount Paws ~ Salted Cashew Brittle Toffee Coffee Truffles Caramels Truffle Assortment (non-alcohol) Cherry Cordials Baxley's Chocolates Mugs Malted Milk Balls Earl Grey Truffles Lavender Truffles Irish Cream Truffle Vanilla Butter Crème Chocolate-Dipped Orange Peel Raspberry Truffles Scuppernong Wine Truffles Warm Weather Packaging Chocolate Pecan Caramel Fudge Chocolate Peanut Butter Fudge Chocolate Fudge Coconut Haystacks Orange Chili Truffles Chocolate-Dipped Ginger Almond Crunch Chai Truffles Orange Butter Crème Caramel Corn Coconut Truffles Mint Butter Crème Beer and Chocolate Pairing Rocky Road Fudge Chocolate-Dipped Apricots Raspberry Butter Crème Snake Song Teas Soulvation IPA Truffles Kids Chocolate Bar Class - May 4 - 10:00 We Are Passionate When It Comes to Our Chocolate. We have been “Crafting Sweet Memories” for three generations. Now you can bring those sweet memories home to your family and friends. You will appreciate the quality that comes with care and dedication to crafting small batch, handmade chocolates. © 2024, Powered by Shopify Choosing a selection results in a full page refresh. Press the space key then arrow keys to make a selection.
